item.title: Alternatives to Home Lab Learning
item.description: Home labs come with many benefits. From learning new technologies, studying for certifications, testing and more. They also come with a cost unless you have sponsors or a lab sugar daddy, these fees come out of your pocket and they can add up.

item.title: Opvizor Health Analyzer Reporting Overview
item.description: I recently received my vExpert NFR license from Opvizor to try their health analyzer tool. For a nice overview of the install process, Michael White has a great post. There really isn’t much to the setup at all, and it is quick and easy to get up and running. Once the setup is complete, the dashboard with your VMware infrastructure info is available. Roger Lund navigates through the dashboard components in this post. What I’m really looking to focus on are Opvizor’s reporting capabilities.
